During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Vigilant Yaksha" [[Xiao]] ({{Anemo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

During the event, the 4-star characters "Shining Idol" [[Barbara]] ({{Hydro}}), "Wise Innocence" [[Yanfei]] ({{Pyro}}), and "Chivalric Blossom" [[Noelle]] ({{Geo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
